## CredentialsOfferMessage type

CredentialsOfferMessage represent Iden3message for credential offer

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CredentialsOfferMessage = {
    id: string;
    typ?: MediaType;
    type: ProtocolMessage;
    thid?: string;
    body?: CredentialsOfferMessageBody;
    from?: string;
    to?: string;
};
```
